items.name: The Las Vegas Strip
items.address: Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.description: The heart of Las Vegas, featuring world-famous resorts, casinos, nightlife, shopping, and nonstop entertainment along a walkable stretch.

items.name: Bellagio Fountains
items.address: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.description: Iconic free fountain show with choreographed water, lights, and music, performed multiple times nightly in front of the Bellagio.

items.name: Fremont Street Experience
items.description: Historic downtown attraction with a massive LED canopy, live music, street performers, casinos, and classic Vegas atmosphere.

items.name: The Neon Museum
items.address: 770 Las Vegas Blvd N, Las Vegas, NV 89101
items.description: Outdoor museum showcasing restored vintage neon signs from Las Vegas history, especially impressive during nighttime tours.

items.name: Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area
items.address: 1000 Scenic Loop Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89161
items.description: Scenic desert conservation area featuring dramatic red rock formations, hiking trails, and a scenic drive just outside the city.

items.name: Cirque du Soleil Las Vegas Shows
items.address: Various locations on the Las Vegas Strip
items.description: World-class live performances combining acrobatics, music, and storytelling, with multiple permanent shows exclusive to Las Vegas.

items.name: The Mob Museum
items.description: Interactive museum exploring the history of organized crime and law enforcement in the United States, featuring authentic artifacts.

items.name: Omega Mart by Meow Wolf
items.address: 3215 S Rancho Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89102
items.description: Immersive and surreal art experience disguised as a grocery store, filled with interactive exhibits and hidden narratives.

items.name: High Roller Observation Wheel
items.address: 3545 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.description: One of the tallest observation wheels in the world, offering panoramic views of the Las Vegas Strip, especially at sunset.

items.name: Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign
items.address: 5100 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89119
items.description: Iconic roadside sign and classic photo spot welcoming visitors to Las Vegas since 1959.
